scripts.bootstrap: npm run bootstrap:script && npm run bootstrap:git && npm run bootstrap:cleanup
scripts.bootstrap:cleanup: npm pkg delete scripts.bootstrap scripts.bootstrap:cleanup scripts.bootstrap:git scripts.bootstrap:script && git add . && git commit --amend -m"Bootstrap babylonjs-template"
scripts.bootstrap:git: git reset ad9ccb09 && git add . && git commit --amend -m"." && git checkout -b main && git branch -D bootstrap
